episodes.title: The Cartel That Became a Cult: The Disturbing Story of La Familia Michoacana
episodes.description:
This wasn't just another drug cartel—it was a religious organization that trafficked meth, preached divine justice, and required members to follow a self-written "bible."

Dive into the shocking true story of La Familia Michoacana, the criminal enterprise founded by self-proclaimed prophet Nazario Moreno González ("El Más Loco"). We trace their origins from anti-Zeta vigilantes to a brutal paramilitary group that terrified the state of Michoacán.

From the infamous 2006 severed head display to their social programs, discover how La Familia manipulated communities by wrapping extreme violence in the language of faith.

In This Video:

The Uruapan nightclub massacre and the message of "divine justice."

Nazario Moreno González's bizarre cult-like philosophy and "bible."

How La Familia became the world's most unique drug trafficking organization.

The truth about "El Más Loco's" two deaths and the splintering of the cartel.
